report.title: Samples list for a warehouse user
report.description: A general purpose list of samples filtered according to the ID of the user as registered on the warehouse.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM samples s JOIN surveys su on su.id=s.survey_id and su.deleted=false LEFT JOIN locations l ON l.id=s.location_id #joins# WHERE s.deleted = FALSE AND #website_filter# AND (CAST(s.survey_id AS character varying)='#survey_id#' OR '#survey_id#'='') AND (trim('#date_from#')='' OR '#date_from#'='Click here' OR s.date_end >= CAST(COALESCE('#date_from#','1500-01-01') as date)) AND (trim('#date_to#')='' OR '#date_to#'='Click here' OR s.date_start <= CAST(COALESCE('#date_to#','1500-01-01') as date)) AND s.created_by_id=#user_id# #order_by#
report.field_sql: s.id as sample_id, su.title as survey, COALESCE(l.name, s.location_name) as location_name, l.id as location_id, l.code, s.entered_sref, s.date_start, s.date_end, s.date_type

param.name: survey_id
param.description: Select the survey, or leave for all surveys

param.name: user_id
param.description: Enter the ID of the warehouse user

param.name: smpattrs
param.description: Comma separated list of sample attribute IDs to include as columns in the report

param.name: sample_method_id
param.description: Select the sample method, or leave blank to not filter by sample method.
param.join: JOIN termlists_terms ttl1 ON ttl1.id=s.sample_method_id INNER JOIN termlists_terms ttl2 ON ttl2.meaning_id=ttl1.meaning_id and ttl2.id=#sample_method_id#
